website_summaries.verdict: The price of this container cannot be beat, although it has a domed lid so isn't easily stackable. Holds 25 pounds of food, and a smaller size is available.
pros: The lid snaps closed and opens easily and quietly to not alert pets, and the wheels are built in so they won't fall off
cons: Might spill if it gets knocked over, and it's hard to scoop food at the bottom because of the wheels

customer_reviews.title: This product is worthless, it is not air tight and ants got into it.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for sugar and dog food. I found that this product is not air tight. Ants got into my home and got into this container. i would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: This pet food container made this old lady very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Just got done pouring 22 lbs of cat food into bin and all went well --- very well! Bin arrived today in pristeen condition. Lid looks to be secure but still not too tough for this 80-year-old's hands to open. Really like the recessed wheels on bottom. Some other products had wheels but they had to be attached by user and then protruded from bottom quite a bit. This unit has been well designed and I could not wait to sit down and pound this review out! Very pleased! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Murphaleen

customer_reviews.title: Try again, cat burglars!
customer_reviews.text: This bucket is great because my cats don't know when they've had enough to eat. In the past, they would just knock the container of food over and gorge themselves while I was at work. Now, the fat felines can't get into the food. I can tell they are plotting a new way in, but their lack of opposable thumbs keep them at bay. For now...
customer_reviews.author: J. Paul Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Nice food container, good price!
customer_reviews.text: This container is perfect for my needs. It holds a 28 pound bag of dog food (I use Taste of the Wild) with room for another couple of pounds. The wheels are recessed which I feel will last longer than the swivel wheels. The downside is that the wheels do not rotate, but not an issue if you are sliding back and forth out of a closet or pantry. The lid has a foam-like gasket to keep bugs out and freshness in. It does have a latch to lock the lid down and keep the dogs from helping themselves to a snack. Overall for the price, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricenova

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my cats food, as I already have one that I bought from Walmart a year ago for my dogs food. The way I was storing my cats food was taking up too much space, so I decided it's time I bought another one of these. Well, this is cheaper than Walmart, or at least my Walmart here, and thought that it would be perfect because I already have one just like it. This works out perfectly and if I get any more fur babies, I know where to come.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: The Seal Came Loose After Less Than 6 Months Filled with Ants!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this. It's too late for us to return but I can prevent others from making a mistake. The seal inside the lid came off one corner and we didn't notice. Went to feed the dog and found the entire bin filled with ants. Not only did we waste money on this , it cost us an almost full $45 bag of dog food we had just filled it up with. I wish there was a way to contact the maker, we'd like to at least get the dog food money back. :(
customer_reviews.author: Genie Lehr

customer_reviews.title: Seals our dog food
customer_reviews.text: The lid locks down firmly so we know it's sealed and will keep bugs out and keeps our dog food fresh. It actually holds a bit more than our 25 lb bag of dog food. The whole bag went in and there was room to lay the scoop in it. The bin comes with wheels so it's easy to push it around.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie NelsonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good Bin For The Price.
customer_reviews.text: So far, this container works as advertised. It rolls easy on the floor....almost too easily really, especiallywhen getting empty. The locking latch, although plastic, snaps securely closed. My only complaint has actually turned into a positive. The bottom of the bin is not flat because of the wheel housings. When scooping out food they were in the way. However, once my measuring cup hits the wheel housing I know it's time to order more dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Fritchman

customer_reviews.title: Love the low profile wheels
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store pine litter for my catbox. It holds a whole 20lb bag of the pine pellets. The wheels make it so I can roll it out of site when I don't need to access it. The lid is easy to open and has a light clasp, so I feel confident my cat's cannot get into it.
customer_reviews.author: lost child

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative trash can
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these bins that I use for pet food. I have a problem with my dog getting into the trash. Have tried all different kinds of cans, and am unwilling to spend a fortune on the big metal pet-proof cans. Since this bin has a nice tight locking handle, I decided to try it out as a trash can and it works brilliantly. My dog cannot get the lid off. No more garbage all over the kitchen floor. Everyone is happy. I highly recommend this bin for its stated purpose of containing food, but it's also a great pet proof trash can in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Wiens

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Just what I was after.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in pantry. Seals good. Only 2 cons. The wheel wells do make it a little difficult to get the last of the food out of the bottom but I prefer this design to it sitting higher with fully external wheels. Also the dog can easily open it as the lid latch isn't very tight. Not an issue if you aren't keeping dog food in it. We just turned it facing the wall so dog can't get nose underneath. Good bin overall
customer_reviews.author: Mysticclam

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I don't use these for pet food, I use them for large item food storage. The 25lb bags of flour, sugar, or the 50 lb bag of rice fits nicely in these and they are easily moved and stored out of the way. I added a 2c scoop and ta-da, I am up and running. I cook most everything from scratch so it is nice to have containers that have a great seal, and wheels for these items.
customer_reviews.author: L. DeVoe

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for what it’s advertised for
customer_reviews.text: However, the recessed wheels seemed awesome when we bought it. Then we put dog food IN it. It’s quite clear we’ll never be able to scoop the food out when it gets low because of the crevasses around the wheels, so we’ll have to turn the whole thing upside down to empty it and hope the lid doesn’t hurt when it inevitably smacks us in the face.
customer_reviews.author: ajmarcott

customer_reviews.title: Happy Find
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats and feed strays outside. I needed something to hold a 20 lb bag of dry cat food that had wheels and there it was. This is great. One minor drawback is that the wheels are set in so inside the box, the wheel "fenders" mean that the inside floor is not flat but has angles and corners where cat food gets trapped, but not a big thing. It gets the cat food out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: HappilyRetired

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Purchased to hold my bird seed. The wheels are holding up well and have been rolling on my carpet quite nicely. Holds a lot of seed and makes life easier for feeding the birds. I just roll it to the patio doors and walk out and fill the feeders. I may have to purchase more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Useful little cat food trolley
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. We use it for cat food and it has been a real life saver in storing bags of cat food (and wheeling it out to refill their dishes). The clamp lock handle is a nice feature to keep the food fresh and it never feels difficult or clunky. It holds at LEAST a whole 16lb bag of cat food, probably more. I can’t be precise as I’ve always refilled it before it was empty.
customer_reviews.author: R Foskey

customer_reviews.title: Great Container
customer_reviews.text: This container works great for us. It is the second one we have purchased. The first for our dog food and this one for our chicken food. Food stays freasher longer. There is a good tight seal around the snap lock lid. This size holds 25lbs bag of food. These could be used for grass seed, bird food, etc. also, wheels on bottom make it easy to roll around.
customer_reviews.author: TCR_JR

customer_reviews.title: Puzzling...
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fine- till you start getting to the bottom. Then... you realize you can’t use the scoop anymore. The wheel covers inside protruding so high that the only way to get the last couple of cups out is to pick up the container and shake the food out. Anybody thought of that?
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: I have had this item for about 2 years and I love it. BUT the lids hinge broke
customer_reviews.text: I have waited to do a review on this item for a awhile, as I felt i needed to really get it my unbiased review. I have had this item for about 2 years and I love it. BUT the lids hinge broke, as in i was closing the lid and two of the little hook areas snapped off. I would totally buy this again as I am still using it. but maybe it is jsut a design flaw
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Marie

customer_reviews.title: Sized for dog food
customer_reviews.text: It's a good container but apparently sized for dog food. So 25lbs of dog food would fill it up however 25lbs of rice is only half full. If they put the word dog in the listing title it would have been more informative.
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: Great container for dog food!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. It is so much easier keeping my dog food in this container than trying to scoop it out of the bag and dropping it all over the floor. The lock works great. It will keep the dog food very fresh. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Keeps pet food fresh with locking lid!
customer_reviews.text: These were a lifesaver. I purchased two: One for cat food and one for dog food. They look great and have kept the food very fresh. I like it so much better than having to try and keep bags of pet food closed. These keep my pet area neat and organized.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: The rollers I haven't found particularly useful since the box filled with food has never gotten ...
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what you want, keeps food fresh and safe and is easier to deal with than a big bag. The rollers I haven't found particularly useful since the box filled with food has never gotten so heavy I needed them but if someone wants them then there they are. I also use about two of these for emergency storage in my truck, but I took the wheels off so they don't roll around. They're water roof and durable enough to be banged around a few times, and cheaper than any fancy waterproof box I found on any number of doomsday sites that came up when I searched for them. Glad I have these instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: The seal is pretty weak and doesn't hold that suction like the more ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my dog food, but I'm not quite sure if it really is airtight. The seal is pretty weak and doesn't hold that suction like the more expensive ones, but for the price, I would have to say that I love the amount it holds. It can hold almost an entire back of large dog food. Pretty happy with the price and the size. The wheels are already installed within the bin and are located recessed within the bottom of the plastic bin. Easy to tote around. The lid does not stop half way, rather folds all the way towards the back of the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Maestranza

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of those pesky bags
customer_reviews.text: These work great for dog food, cat food, rabbit hay and bedding. We have so many of these in my house. They seal really well and hold a good amount. Love them. Makes storing pet goods so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jlshapiro89

customer_reviews.title: nice, convenient, save space
customer_reviews.text: Great container - holds neatly a 30-lb IAM dog food bag; is easily tucked away with wheels; clear so amount of food remaining in bin can easily be seen (making it easier to know when need to re-stock); wheels are sturdy/easy to maneuver, lid snaps close easily; well priced; good quality. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cypress, Tx

customer_reviews.title: Best Animal Food Container
customer_reviews.text: This food container is fantastic. The wheels are completely hidden under it and it rolls great. The seal is complete and keeps the food fresh. I have had another one for years and it still keeps food fresh. I recommend this highly.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret McGuffin

customer_reviews.title: No more bags!
customer_reviews.text: I have a smaller container similar to this one. So I knew I would love this. I needed something that would hold my 24 pound bag of dry cat food instead of just having a bag sitting around. It seems to work just right. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Brazier

customer_reviews.title: Fits 50lb rice
customer_reviews.text: You got that right. Haha I bought this for my rice because I was tired of scooping from the bag. It fits 50lbs of rice with space to spare on top. And the price was pretty affordable as well. I was looking around for containers for rice and they were just outrageous.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my smaller space. Like the built in wheels.
customer_reviews.text: I decided on this model because of the height. I wanted it to fit underneath the lowest shelf in my pantry. Mission accomplished! It holds 25lbs of dry dog food. The product arrive in perfect condition. On it's maiden voyage the lid is very secure and the container rolls easily. Exactly what I was hoping to find. Can't be the price. I am hoping that it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: CLo

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 dogs so to keep their foods separate is nice so we got 2. It’s nice it’s on wheels but doesn’t slide around when we get in to scoop food out. Now to find something similar for toys and treats lol
customer_reviews.author: Shavonne Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maneuver, good quality
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived as described. The lid locks tightly and the plastic is solid, good quality. The wheels make it easier to maneuver. I can't comment on 'freshness' as I haven't put the item to use yet. The only glitch was a mix up with the delivery which resulted in a 1-2 day delay receiving the item. When I realized that there was a problem, I was able to contact the seller and they were very responsive, located the item and I received it by 5 p.m. the next business day.
customer_reviews.author: H Unger

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store my dog's food, in the garage. It doesn't take up much space, seals well, and keeps his food fresh. I have not had any ant or other insect/rodent problems with this container. I think its a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfBoys

customer_reviews.title: Good Product for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: We live in a country where our pets are our children therefore manufacturers of pet supplies sell supplies that have prices that are truly outrageous considering what they are selling. This pet food container is fairly reasonably priced. The wheels are built in, which I think is lovely. It seals well enough to keep the dog food "fresh", considering most of us kept our dog food in the original bags before we got fancy. I bought two of these; one for cat food and one for dog food. They fit well in the pantry with no spills, fuss, muss or bother. So rather than spend $30 plus for a pet food container, consider this one.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyB

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and kind of handy
customer_reviews.text: I know a week's usage should not be considered for review writing. But I just loved this container! When it arrived, it had a little weird odor in it. It was gone after I left it open for 2 days and washed with hot water-soap mixture. It holds the whole 20 lbs rice bag I got from wholesale market. And smooth wheels make it easy to move inside pantry. Just what I was looking for my pantry!
customer_reviews.author: A. Rathod

customer_reviews.title: So far we are very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this amidst mixed reviews. We decided for the price it was worth checking out for storing dog food, with the possibility for repurposing if if that did not work. So far we are very pleased with it. One note, we are not concerned with "air tight" sealing as we live in a semi-arid climate. I like how easy it is to move the container out from under the shelf to get the food, and it slides back in easily (on our laminate flooring).
customer_reviews.author: BMitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this! I was between this one and one just a little less money. I’m so glad I chose this one. The wheels are inside the bottom so they’re secure and it moves very easy. It’s a great size for the XL cat food I buy. Would buy again if ever needed 😊
customer_reviews.author: Vickt16

customer_reviews.title: Crowley Proof
customer_reviews.text: This holds more like 30-32 lbs. the wheels make it so much easier to move around. Our dog isn’t able to open this one, like he was our old one.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Bruey

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR MY NEEDS.
customer_reviews.text: TOOK ME AWHILE TO GET USE TO THE LOCK AND HOW TO OPEN IN QUICKLY. I JUST HAVE MY ONE DOGGY BOY. EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED AT A GREAT PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: Catsroses

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about ordering this afer seeing other reviews but went ahead and got it. I've had it for about 6 months now and haven't had any issues with it at all. The wheels on it are perfect making it super easy to move when needed and it not be annoying to move it each time. Food seems to stay fresher.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: I have 3 now
customer_reviews.text: I bought a third container to hold my dry pinto beans. I have one for dry rice and also dog food. They roll around great and the lock doesn't break.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is great for our dog’s food. We were looking at far more expensive options and I am really glad we went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good containers
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for dog food. They are easy to roll around and the top snaps shut well. One was delivered cracked and upon calling Amazon they replace it within a matter of days.
customer_reviews.author: kathrynsalazar

customer_reviews.title: The inset wheels are in the way
customer_reviews.text: I like the bin. I bought 2. They're easy to put together and the snap close is nice. However, the inset wheels make it difficult to get to the last of the dog food. I end up scooping it by handfuls at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Moves Well With Full Load
customer_reviews.text: Moves easily even with a full load of cat food inside. Keeps food fresh and no complaints here from the cats. Or me.
customer_reviews.author: JaxPix

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality Closes correctly, no looseness Easy to move around My dog’s 25 pound bag of food fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Omayra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item for cat food storage
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this storage container. I use mine to hold dry cat food. Perfect size and works great! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jole Blon

customer_reviews.title: Well designed - good container
customer_reviews.text: Excellent storage container. The lid opens easily, closes snugly, it rolls easily on its little wheels - don't know what else a person could want. I also like its shape - the wider, squatter shape is more stable, I have an older cat food bin that is taller and thinner - sometimes it tends to tip when I'm emptying a new bag of cat food into it - this one is very stable - no tipping! All in all, I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Farm wife

customer_reviews.title: Nice Find
customer_reviews.text: The Good: This thing is durable and holds waaaaaaaaaaaaay more food than advertised. The Bad: If you have a smart dog, they will be helping themselves to food on day one. I suggest placing this container somewhere the lid and latch aren't accessible to your dog. My Shiba Inu pup figured out how to get into this container within about five minutes. We decided to place it latch-side up against a wall and it works perfectly for us. I's still recommend it based on price, capacity and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Chelzie

customer_reviews.title: Just Right and Snug Tight
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and how snugly it closes. It has nice movements with the wheels. Great tool! I will get more over time as I need them.
customer_reviews.author: LReeves

customer_reviews.title: Quality Container..25 pound size
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for the 20 pound bag of dog food I buy with room left over so when it runs low I can still empty a new bag into the container without overfilling. The snap lid really seals...nice feature as no matter what I did with the bag it still did not stay tightly closed after it was opened. The wheels are nice additiion although I have the container in a spot where it won't be moved much but if needed I won't be lifting 20 pounds of dog food plus the container to do it. This looks like a good long term investment in fresh food for Fido.
customer_reviews.author: Elphy 2

customer_reviews.title: Holds A More Than Stated
customer_reviews.text: I buy the CANIDAE LAMB AND RICE DRY DOG FOOD 35lb bag. This probably holds 30lbs of it. the last 5lbs I dump into my dogs bowl so i can throw the bag away. My dog isnt a glutton so I dont have to worry about him over eating. He eats when hes hungry and quits when hes full. 5lbs will last him almost 3 days. He is a 35-40lb border collie. That being said this container doesnt seal perfectly air tight but the lid is tight no less. the rolling casters work great and this fits perfectly in my pantry. Would definitly buy it again. Its been about 6 months and this has held up just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Carpe Diem

customer_reviews.title: Great Container
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed for our dog's food. He developed a propensity for trying to tear up his food bag. This container easily held a full bag of food. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Diana Pullin

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged. I ordered 2 of the same item. One arrived fine, but the other was damaged when received.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is great for our dog's food. It holds a full bag of his food, plus some from the previous bag, if needed. As others have noted it is not airtight, but that wasn't what I was expecting. I am happy to have his food away from the mice and any other small critters that might help themselves.It opens easily, and the wheels make it easy to move if need be.
customer_reviews.author: dinomom

customer_reviews.title: Rolls easy - even when filled with dog food
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because top to floor dimensions fit perfectly under shelving in the laundry room (where feeding occurs). Rollers allow the container to easily slide in and out from under the shelving.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Container
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It moves around easy and holds a lot of food glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Dunkley

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: Use this for cat food and keep it outside under my porch. So far it’s keeping cat food dry! Would order again if I needed another.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Squeezed 32 pounds in!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to keep the mice out of the dog food! This is perfect. I was able to squeeze in a 32 lb bag. The wheels worked well even when full. Best price I could find for similar container with lid.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy T

customer_reviews.title: Bottom isn’t flat
customer_reviews.text: The fact that the bottom isn’t flat really sucks for scooping food out, my fault for not reading the reviews but a serious design flaw nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & nice
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to our daughter. She had one & needed another & she loves these — they are sturdy, large capacity & do come with wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bulk storage for rice and pasta
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fit under the bottom shelf of my pantry. I keep the pasta and bulky rice bags I buy at Costco in here. This is keeping the bugs out of products for a longer time. The wheels allow me to roll it out and dig though to find the product I want. I used to keep these items in a big open bin on a shelf in my pantry but the wieght was getting too heavy for me to pull out and lift every time I wanted to find a special type of rice or pasta.
customer_reviews.author: JoanD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the pup food!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. Size is right. I like to store in closet and I don't lose any hanging space due to height.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome container!
customer_reviews.text: This container is exactly as described. The rollers work well, and the bin is airtight. It keeps my cat's kibble fresh and free from bugs. It is very easy to open and close. I usually keep the container in one spot, but when I have to move it around, the wheel movement is very smooth. Also, I like the clear container because I can see at a glance how much food is left. I use the Pureness 2 cup scoop (also purchased from Amazon). It is a very sturdy container and I feel it will last me a very long time. I'm so glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: LikesAngels

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size for the cat food. Easy accessibility, instead of the cat food bag it comes in...
customer_reviews.author: QT

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to store 25 pound bags of Parrot food. They hold that amount very well with a little space left over for the scoop to go in. The wheels are good quallity and they can roll around even full of food. My only complaint is that they aren't stackable. I read in someone's answer in the Q&A section that they are but they really are not. The top container wobbles if you try to stack them. The airtight seal seems really good and the quality of the plastic seems high as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Prefect size for 30 lbs of dog food
customer_reviews.text: My pup use to chew right through the dog bag so I decided to purchase this food container. It holds over 30 lbs of food. The lid has snap on lock which is great because my little one is smart and will try to flip the lid open when he gets big enough. I like how the wheels are set in and does not extend out. It rolls easily across the floor. Durable and tough. I think it will last a while, especially when you have a pup that likes to chew up everything in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Bing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!!! I bought three for our dogs dog food and couldn’t be happier! It latches shut and it’s easy to move!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Elsey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We like to buy several bags of food for our cat at a time, especially when they go on sale. This container keeps it fresh! The only thing is the wheels are only on the back so it is a little difficult to move around, but not terribly. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Makayla

customer_reviews.title: The lid shuts nice and tight...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to hold dry dog food. The latch holds the top close nice and tight. Good price too, much cheaper than that other places with low prices everyday...
customer_reviews.author: Raymo

customer_reviews.title: Best ones around
customer_reviews.text: I have three dogs who eat different types of food (one is a senior dog) so I’ve been through a fair share of food storage containers. I bought two 25lbs Van Ness containers to store their kibble and they’re the best I’ve ever purchased. No smell, no ants, no spillage, easy access to the food. It’s been two years since I purchased them and they’re both still holding up really well.
customer_reviews.author: PatyPoppins

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner, easier, and way more convenient.
customer_reviews.text: This makes feeding the dog so much more convenient and doesn't let my exspensive dog food spoil. It fits perfectly in the closet and I enjoy the wheels instead of lifting a bag of dog food. So far it has been a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: SamiiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pretty useful
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I bought this container to store rice in. It's pretty straightforward. The only thing that would make it even better would be if the wheels could move in all directions.
customer_reviews.author: Cheng Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love that this container is on low profile wheels. It looks nice and moves easily. I store it under a counter so the wheels make it easily accessible. We haven't had any issue with bugs or odor either. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Smitherman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Feels sturdy and like the wheels are closer to the container so I’m not worried about one breaking and it tilting. I have 3 small dogs but I hate having to open the dog food and not being able to close it so I like the lock on top. Plus my nice loves to feed the dogs and this makes it easier to scoop it out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works well for cat food
customer_reviews.text: Used it for cat food and stacked it on the dog food container seems to keep it fresh and I no longer can smell the cat food.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: I've asked my dog about the crunchiness of her kibble and she says this container sucks. Ask her yourself
customer_reviews.text: Not airtight, so ants can stroll right in and have a party inside. Also, the container does not keep the food very fresh. I've asked my dog about the crunchiness of her kibble and she says this container sucks. Ask her yourself.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lee

customer_reviews.title: I love that the wheel so are built in so they're ...
customer_reviews.text: Not Air tight but I store thing in ziploc bags or things that don't have to be protected from air. I love that the wheel so are built in so they're not always falling off like the other one but the other ones I have the wheels move it all directions and this one doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana CTop Contributor: Aquascaping

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Love that the wheels are hidden away. Only thing that keeps this from being a five is the interior is not flat. Because the wheels are hidden away there are extrusions on the interior for them so when my dog's food gets low I have to tip the container to avoid them or completely flip it over to get the last few bits.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo R.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this when we noticed ants in the closet where ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when we noticed ants in the closet where we kept our cat food (we also happen to keep a trash can in there). Since using this, cleaning out the closet, and and adding a few ant traps, we haven't seen any more ants. The ants didn't appear to get into the food at all. We also spilled liquid on the container at one point and I don't think any of the liquid seeped through. Overall, it seems to function as promised and probably keeps the cat food fresher too.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia S.

customer_reviews.title: It serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: It holds my dog food. It sits in my laundry room. It doesn't make my laundry room smell like dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F.

customer_reviews.title: Good size, nice price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, large size. It easily fits into our kitchen pantry and rolls in and out with ease. I hope to get many years use out of this.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Pegram

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food and sugar fresh and is convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, came fully assembled which is a definite plus and the recessed wheels are nice!!! I use 1 to store sugar, the other for cat food. My sugar stays clump free and I can buy each (the cat food and sugar in bulk) the containers keep them fresh
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact storage bin
customer_reviews.text: Wheels located underside so out of way. Small compact storage great for smaller spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Container for Pet Food
customer_reviews.text: This bin holds slightly more than advertised, and keeps dog food fresh for a long period of time. The rollers work well and make it easy to move the bin around when it is full of food. It's easy to scoop out of and it is very sturdy. The only downside to this container is that sometimes it's a little difficult to latch. When you close it, sometimes the latch doesn't click all of the way and I find myself having to press on it to make sure it's completely airtight. Even with this, it's still a five star buy and totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Does what it's supposed to. Holds more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: RitaB

customer_reviews.title: Wheels are not great at all!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in the area I needed it to fit in. BUT the wheels at the bottom definitely do not work well with a 25lb weight that this container is meant for. You really have to tug the container out practically which I did not want out of the aspect of it. I just got this item today so I cannot speak on how well it keeps the items fresh inside.
customer_reviews.author: Anson T.

customer_reviews.title: Love this for storing 30lbs of Dry Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: I use this for 30lb bags of Taste of the Wilderness dry food and the entire bag does fit in here if I open the bag and dump it in. There is even still a room left for the scoop. It seals nice and is on wheels so it is easy to move if you need to. We were using a 33 gal trash can before getting this and this is so much better! Even though they rate this for 25 lbs...our 30lbs fit in here easily.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Dog food storage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing my pups food and keeping in other household pets out
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Food/Treat Container
customer_reviews.text: Love these containers! Easy to roll out when scooping the food and the clasp is easy to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great pet food container.
customer_reviews.text: Great pet food container. It actually fits more than 25 lbs. of dog food; at least 30 lbs. Once the food gets down to the bottom it’s hard to scoop out because of the indentions from the wheels, but other than that it works and holds more dog food than is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent investment
customer_reviews.text: No more ants!! I think that is the most important thing I can say. This is fully airtight, so the food is always fresh. And it holds more than 25 pounds which is a great bonus. This was a great investment in the health of my cats and my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Size and Design Are Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Container arrived intact with no damage. This is the exact size I was looking for. It fit a 17 pound bag of dog food with room to spare. Too soon to determine if food will stay fresh, since I’ve only had it for two days.
customer_reviews.author: Celina Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great food container but lid not raccoon proof
customer_reviews.text: I especially like the size of the container and the built in wheels. While raccoons were able to pry open the lid, I would highly recommend this container in areas without wildlife pests.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Beilan

customer_reviews.title: Simple, practical
customer_reviews.text: This tub is simple and practical. It helped me organize the pet food and keep it fresh.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonD

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought one of these sooner!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful to put the dog food in. It contains any smell (and the Taste of the Wild Pacific Salmon does smell), it also seems pretty airtight. Easy to open and close: my 4 y/o can feed the dog and close it when he is done. The wheels on the bottom are also nice to move it around when it is full and I like that you can see how much dog food is left in the container. A great buy. Wish I had bought one of these sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Casey T

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This container holds a 25lb bag of dog food. It looks nice so I’m able to keep it in sight and it keeps the food fresh and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Schu

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: It’s the second one I bought it’s very convenient and the price is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G Curcio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Container!
customer_reviews.text: We used this as a indoor recycling bin for my son's aluminium can crushing hobby. It works perfectly for what we need!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Contreras Estrada

customer_reviews.title: A great container!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dog food container! I haven't filled it up with a fresh bag of food but I have a feeling it'll hold our 30 lb bag of Blue Buffalo. Before this we had an IRIS container and it was great until one of the wheels broke off. With this container, the wheels are set into the bottom so I don't think we'll have to worry about broken wheels again. I also like that the lid is a neutral color.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

product_meta.title: Van Ness 25-Pound Food Container with Fresh-Tite Seal with Wheels
product_meta.description: Ideal for Pet Owners Who Want to Store 25-Pounds of Pet Food. Fresh-Tite Seal Ensures Your Pet's Food Will Stay Fresh Longer Reducing Spoilage Due to Pests and Moisture. Made From United States Food and Drug Administration Approved Plastic for Food Contact. Designed with Four In-line Wheels for Easy Mobility.
feature_bullets: Ideal for pet owners who want to store 25-pounds of pet food
Fresh-tite seal ensures your pet's food will stay fresh longer reducing spoilage due to pests and moisture
Made from united states food and drug administration approved plastic for food contact

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
